oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Microwave-assisted Claisen rearrangement on a silica gel support
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
MANDAL, K
DEB, AC
BANERJEE, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: surface-mediated reactions
allyl vinyl ethers
catalysis
oxidation
claisen rearrangement
microwave irradiation
silica gel support
solvent-free synthesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A fast, efficient and environmentally benign solvent-free procedure has been developed for microwave-assisted Claisen rearrangement on a silica gel support. Various bis-allyl ketones were prepared using this protocol. (C) 2004 Elsevier Ltd.
